item.title: Canadians Flee To U.S. After Doctors Threaten To ‘Unplug’ Their Son And Harvest His Organs
item.description: Doctors were 'constantly talking about' harvesting Arthur’s organs, according to Tétrault.

item.title: Zuckerberg’s Rebrand Of Facebook’s Role In Biden Censorship Scheme Refuted In Facebook Files
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg told Joe Rogan that Facebook pushed back on the Biden regime’s censorship demands. The Facebook Files say otherwise.

item.title: Zuckerberg’s Recent Admission Proves SCOTUS 1A Ruling Was A Grave Miscarriage Of Justice
item.description: Zuckerberg's admission of a pressure campaign lays bare the truth: the government colluded with Big Tech to violate Americans' First Amendment right a...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Defends Masculinity In Post-Election Makeover
item.description: Zuckerberg explained his recent embrace of martial arts had shaped his thinking.

item.title: Trump Must Immediately Build On Texas’ Successful Border Work
item.description: Texas has faithfully executed the law and played a vital role in national security -- a role the state must now maintain and reinforce.
